Name: Medusa
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with the Spear of the Gorgons and the Hair of Serpents.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

At the start of each step this model may select an enemy Formation within 12" and roll a D6. On a 4+ (or a 6+ if the selected Formation has the LEGENDARY tag) the selected Formation may not Move, Dash, Disengage, Cast Magic Spells, Deny Magic Spells, Fire Raged weapons, Charge, Counter Charge or be selected to fight until the end of the step.

Spells.Name: Gaze of Terror (25)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 18" of the caster. Until the end of the round models in that Formation must subtract 1 from their hit and wound rolls.
